articles.author: Akshat Gaur
articles.title: Virat Kohli's sister pens a heartwarming story for her brother after India's win over Australia in ODI World Cup 2023 - Cricket Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli’s sister expressed her pride on Indian superstar’s tremendous knock against Australia on Sunday. Kohli scored 85 off 116 deliveries to steer India to victory in their opening game at ODI World Cup 2023.
articles.content: Indian cricket superstar Virat Kohlidelivered one of the most unforgettable performances of his international career on Sunday during the ODI World Cup 2023 clash against Australia. His remarkable in… [+1904 chars]
